questions.question: Who are you?
questions.answer: I am Aatu Selkee, a second year student at Aalto-University.

questions.question: What are you studying?
questions.answer: My major is mathematics and system analytics, how ever I also study data science, programming and machine learning. A few of my courses include linear algebra, data structures and algorithms as well as machine learning.

questions.question: what do you study
questions.answer: My major is mathematics and system analytics, how ever I also study data science, programming and machine learning. A few of my courses include linear algebra, data structures and algorithms as well as machine learning.

questions.question: What are your hobbies?
questions.answer: My hobbies include basketball, gym, investments, programming and gaming. I also like to hang out with my friends and go to parties organised by Aalto university.

questions.question: How did you get into investing?
questions.answer: A friend of mine started investing into index funds, which inspired me to look into the possibility of putting money to work. At the moment I invest into index funds, etfs and stocks.

questions.question: How did you get into basketball?
questions.answer: I started playeing basketball when I was 6 years old. Since then, I played for around 10 years, however nowadays I am a referee, which takes up some time. Ocationally I still play basketball for fun with my friends.

questions.question: What skills do you have related to programming?
questions.answer: I mainly program using python and its libraries, however I started using Scala at the beginning of university. At the moment I am the most interested in machine learning and I like using tensorflow for the tasks. This semester I am taking a lot of courses related to programming, which include data structures and algorithms, databases, optimisation and arteficial intelligence. I am also interested in web development, how ever I have not started practising yet.

questions.question: What games do you play?
questions.answer: My most played game is Counter Strike. I also like single player games with good stories and inventive puzzle games. My favorite games include cs, cities skylines, rdr 2, witcher 3, a monsters expedition, the witness, god of war and celeste.

questions.question: What is your previous job experience?
questions.answer: I have a lot of experience from working for my age. My most advanced place is a basketball referee, where I have learned a lot of people skills. As a referee you must communicate with both the winning and losing team, which is not always easy. In addition, I have worked at Eurokangas oy storage, Halton oy factory and many more places.

questions.question: What did you do for your mandatory military service?
questions.answer: I served at Parolannummi as a second lieutenant. I visited hamina for about 3 months, where I got the best leadership education that exists in Finland. My military service taught me how to manage a platoon of about 30 soldiers, but most importantly, how to treat each one of them as a unique person with their own needs.

questions.question: Which languages are you able to speak?
questions.answer: I speak Finnish and English fluently. In addition I speak Swedish at an adequate level.

questions.question: example questions
questions.answer: Some questions that you might want to ask are: Who are you? What are you studying? What are your hobbies? What skills do you have related to programming? What is your previous job experience? What languages do you speak? How did you get into [insert skill]? What did you do for your mandatory military service?
